remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增屬性的任何 HTML 控制項配接器可以呼叫方法。The method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add an attribute. 因為它是虛擬的您也可以加以自訂配接器繼承這個方法。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method. 若要判斷裝置是否支援存取索引鍵屬性，請使用屬性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入`src`， `soundstart`， `loop`， `volume`， `vibration`，以及`viblength`屬性``和``項目，如果裝置支援的屬性。The method writes the `src`, `soundstart`, `loop`, `volume`, `vibration`, and `viblength` attributes in `` and `` elements, if the device supports the attributes. 若要判斷裝置是否支援存取索引鍵屬性，請使用屬性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property. 若要將屬性加入任何 HTML 控制項配接器可以呼叫這個方法。This method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add the attributes. 因為它是虛擬的您也可以加以自訂配接器繼承這個方法。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援所謂*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 會使用必須顯示更多畫面的 UI 中，相同的方式，以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式會顯示對話方塊的控制項。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 如需有關第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100))文件。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)) documentation.

span.span: if the adapter generates markup that requires <> tags for form submission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性由類別，以判斷是否在產生的標記中需要的表單標記。This property is used by the class to determine whether the form tag is needed in the resulting markup. 目前，會辨識 cHTML 配接器上的設定。Currently, only the settings on cHTML adapters are recognized. 不過，您可以使用這個屬性來提供您自己的轉譯在您的配接器。However, you can use this property to provide your own rendering in your adapters.

summary.span: 設定或傳回控制項的第二個使用者介面 (UI) 模式。

span.span: Sets or returns the secondary user interface (UI) mode for the control.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 控制項的任何第二個 UI 模式。

span.span: The secondary UI mode for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援所謂*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 會使用必須顯示更多畫面的 UI，方式與在以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式中的對話方塊中的控制項。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 如需有關第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100))。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

related.span: 配接器集的功能

span.span: Adapter Sets Functionality
